reporter_caption.center: IN THE INTEREST OF McCORMICK, A MINOR, 299 Pa. Super. 578 (1982)

caption.center: In the Interest of McCormick, a minor.
Appeal of Bonnie McCormick, a minor Commonwealth (Participating Party).

opinion.posture: Juvenile delinquency proceedings. Criminal trespass. Before SCIRICA, J. No. 1277 Philadelphia 1980. Appeal from the order of the Court of Common Pleas of Montgomery County, Juvenile Division, No. 132 of 1980.
opinion.attorneys: Marsha Levick, for appellant; Ronald T. Williamson, Assistant District Attorney, for Commonwealth, participating party.
opinion.panel: Before PRICE, MONTEMURO and VAN der VOORT, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
Order affirmed.
MONTEMURO, J., filed a memorandum concurring statement.
